channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report E-2023090458
item.description:
Report E-2023090458

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that 2 of the 50 pound bags of ammonium chloride (un3260) had been punctured by a sharp object and had released 60 pounds of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking and removed from sortation, then brought to QA. DescribePack: One bottle had a loose, leaking cap. No inner packing. No hazardous labels. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed right side up in a spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report I-2023090039
item.description:
Report I-2023090039

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE TO CONTAIN 5 AREOSOL CANS THAT WERE NOT DECLARED WITH ANY MARKINGS ON THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED CHAIN OF COMMAND, NOTIFIED RMP. RMP CALLED HMSC AND REPORTED. HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report I-2023090016
item.description:
Report I-2023090016

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: Portland
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DELTA AIR LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Delta received notification on 07/24/23 of an undeclared event where lithium-ion batteries inside cell phones in freight marked "Apparel" on the air waybill. The cell phones were discovered during screening and not accepted/transported. Flight#: DL1021 Date: 07/24/2023 AWB: 006-76029693 The event is under investigation to determine root cause and subsequent corrective actions. See the attached pictures.

item.title: Report I-2023080045
item.description:
Report I-2023080045

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-23
  • City: Lyons
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: NEXGEN LOGISTICS LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 1
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The driver left the road at around 40mph for an unknown reason. We suspect he had a medical emergency. The truck crashed into several large oak trees and burst into flames. The fire burned the entire truck and truck mounted cargo tank completely down. The product in the tank burned and soaked into the soil.The driver was burned up in the cab to the point that no autopsy or testing could be done.
